doc: Crash on Linux Mint on reindexing
I changed the project options and excluded external libs like curl...etc.
During the reindexing the whole application crashes .
18:56:16 | SqliteStorage.cpp:30 ~SqliteStorage() | ERROR: CPPSQLITE_ERROR[1000]: Unable to close database
Maybe you should auto create dumps on app crashes.
Let me know if you need more informations.
